about_the_game:
A stroke of luck on your Zombie Survival Adventure! An unexpected discovery that will make your zombie fighting more interesting. This DLC contains a new backpack that provides 140 weight bonus to your character inventory plus:
• "Teddy Bear" Hat. Cozy protection to bear with style!
• Pet Crow: will keep you company and make you look cool.
• Combat Knives: A pair of combat knives to be used in melee. Finish the infected like a boss!
